title: suggest an alternate for Atrament
content: Could anyone suggest an alternate font similar to Atrament?
author: ivank

comments.content: I don't know of any other typefaces that are that condensed and rounded as well.

If [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102004027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/atrament/) is the Atrament you mean, there was a post this morning for a font that met this description and Chris Keegan identified it as [Ultramegnetic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102004027/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0020).

- Mike Yanega

Can you explain why Atrament doesn't work for you? Then we can make a better recommendation. Meanwhile:

[Number Two](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102004027/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Number+Two/)  
 [Helvetica Bold Rounded Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102004027/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/helvetica_std_rounded_bold_condensed/)  
 [PTL Adagio](http://web.archive.org/web/20141102004027/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/primetype/ptl_adigo_ot/)
